newsitem.title: USA: RLI to report comprehensive earnings.
newsitem.headline: RLI to report comprehensive earnings.

text.p: RLI Corp on Tuesday said the Federal Accounting Standards Board was considering a proposal to require companies to report comprehensive earnings to shareholders as prominently as it does GAAP (generally acceptable accounting principles) earnings.
It said the main difference was that along with underwriting profit and investment income, comprehensive earnings included unrealized gains or losses after tax.
